metadata.title: CVE-2024-46723 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: fix ucode out-of-bounds read warningClear warning that read ucode[] may out-of-bounds.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-261.295').
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-231.243~16.04.1').
linux-kvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1176.191').
linux-aws-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-azure package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1183.198~16.04.1').
linux-gcp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oracle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
